item.title: Words and sentences: names of animals
item.summary: Of what appears to be an Incantation, reciting the names of different animals successively, we have several versions, –three by /a!kúnta alone. (B I. 249…) |xam words and sentences (the names of animals).
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book I
item.author: |a!kunta (Stoffel) (I) (and possibly ||kabbo)
